description: Institutional Strengthening for HIV/AIDS Prevention and Control

subproject.description: The Institutional Strengthening for HIV/AIDS Prevention and Control project seeks to develop the capacity of the National AIDS Coordinating Committee (NACC) to plan and implement multi-sectoral strategies at both the national and sub-national levels to limit the spread of HIV/AIDS and mitigate its social and economic impact on vulnerable groups such as the poor and women. This is to accomplished through the establishment of a Secretariat and a Project Coordinating Unit that will support the work of the NACC.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
